description:
Season Seven Match
HOLLY HEART
The Hitman
HT: 5'6
WT: 140 lbs
Season record (0-0)
Lifetime record (0-0)VENDETTA
Vendetta
HT: 5'6
WT: 135lbs
Season record (0-0)
Lifetime record (0-0)
Holly Heart returns to Ultimate Surrender and will be a full time wreslter for Season Seven, we saw her debut in a special exhibition match with the Dragon during the Summer Vengeance Tourney. Holly is big, in shape, and cut. Holly might be one of the strongest girls on the roster. Vendetta is back and was last years welterweight Champion! She was runner up to the overall Championship. She wants to be the only person to win the Championship twice. However, her work is cut out for her as Ultimate Surrender has the best and most competitive sexual wrestlers in the world!
Vendetta shows how she never missed a step- she dominates her bigger opponent, makes her submit (tap out) to two brutal leg scissors. Finger fucks her helpless opponent on the mat, then fucks her ass in RD4. Wwelcome to Ultimate Surrender, Holly.
title: Holly "The Hit Man" Heart (0-0) vs Vendetta (0-0)
